short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that converts timestamps to readable dates.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension aims to detect timestamps on web pages and display the corresponding date in a readable format next to the timestamp. This is useful for users who frequently come across timestamps in numeric formats and wish to have a quick visual reference of the associated date.

By installing this extension, users will benefit from the following advantages:

Enhanced convenience: The extension automates the task of converting timestamps into readable dates, eliminating the need for users to do it manually.

Time savings: By displaying the date directly next to the timestamp, users can instantly obtain temporal information without having to perform additional searches or calculations.

Improved understanding: The representation in a readable format facilitates the interpretation of timestamps, especially for users who are unfamiliar with specific numeric notations.
